text: Riom-Parsonz was a municipality of the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2016, the municipalities of Riom-Parsonz, Bivio, Cunter, Marmorera, Mulegns, Salouf, Savognin, Sur and Tinizong-Rona merged into the new municipality of Surses. Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Riom-Parsonz
